t: O give thanks{H3034}{(H8685)} unto the LORD{H3068}; call{H7121}{(H8798)} upon his name{H8034}: make known{H3045}{(H8685)} his deeds{H5949} among the people{H5971}.
Sing{H7891}{(H8798)} unto him, sing psalms{H2167}{(H8761)} unto him: talk{H7878}{(H8798)} ye of all his wondrous works{H6381}{(H8737)}.
Glory{H1984}{(H8690)} ye in his holy{H6944} name{H8034}: let the heart{H3820} of them rejoice{H8055}{(H8799)} that seek{H1245}{(H8764)} the LORD{H3068}.
Seek{H1875}{(H8798)} the LORD{H3068}, and his strength{H5797}: seek{H1245}{(H8761)} his face{H6440} evermore{H8548}.
Remember{H2142}{(H8798)} his marvellous works{H6381}{(H8737)} that he hath done{H6213}{(H8804)}; his wonders{H4159}, and the judgments{H4941} of his mouth{H6310};
O ye seed{H2233} of Abraham{H85} his servant{H5650}, ye children{H1121} of Jacob{H3290} his chosen{H972}.
He is the LORD{H3068} our God{H430}: his judgments{H4941} are in all the earth{H776}.
He hath remembered{H2142}{(H8804)} his covenant{H1285} for ever{H5769}, the word{H1697} which he commanded{H6680}{(H8765)} to a thousand{H505} generations{H1755}.
Which covenant he made{H3772}{(H8804)} with Abraham{H85}, and his oath{H7621} unto Isaac{H3446};
And confirmed{H5975}{(H8686)} the same unto Jacob{H3290} for a law{H2706}, and to Israel{H3478} for an everlasting{H5769} covenant{H1285}:
Saying{H559}{(H8800)}, Unto thee will I give{H5414}{(H8799)} the land{H776} of Canaan{H3667}, the lot{H2256} of your inheritance{H5159}:
When they were but a few men{H4962} in number{H4557}; yea, very few{H4592}, and strangers{H1481}{(H8802)} in it.
When they went{H1980}{(H8691)} from one nation{H1471} to another, from one kingdom{H4467} to another{H312} people{H5971};
He suffered{H3240}{(H8689)} no man{H120} to do them wrong{H6231}{(H8800)}: yea, he reproved{H3198}{(H8686)} kings{H4428} for their sakes;
Saying, Touch{H5060}{(H8799)} not mine anointed{H4899}, and do my prophets{H5030} no harm{H7489}{(H8686)}.
Moreover he called{H7121}{(H8799)} for a famine{H7458} upon the land{H776}: he brake{H7665}{(H8804)} the whole staff{H4294} of bread{H3899}.
He sent{H7971}{(H8804)} a man{H376} before{H6440} them, even Joseph{H3130}, who was sold{H4376}{(H8738)} for a servant{H5650}:
Whose feet{H7272} they hurt{H6031}{(H8765)} with fetters{H3525}: he{H5315} was laid{H935}{(H8804)} in iron{H1270}:
Until the time{H6256} that his word{H1697} came{H935}{(H8800)}: the word{H565} of the LORD{H3068} tried{H6884}{(H8804)} him.
The king{H4428} sent{H7971}{(H8804)} and loosed{H5425}{(H8686)} him; even the ruler{H4910}{(H8802)} of the people{H5971}, and let him go free{H6605}{(H8762)}.
He made{H7760}{(H8804)} him lord{H113} of his house{H1004}, and ruler{H4910}{(H8802)} of all his substance{H7075}:
To bind{H631}{(H8800)} his princes{H8269} at his pleasure{H5315}; and teach his senators{H2205} wisdom{H2449}{(H8762)}.
Israel{H3478} also came{H935}{(H8799)} into Egypt{H4714}; and Jacob{H3290} sojourned{H1481}{(H8804)} in the land{H776} of Ham{H2526}.
And he increased{H6509}{(H8686)} his people{H5971} greatly{H3966}; and made them stronger{H6105}{(H8686)} than their enemies{H6862}.
He turned{H2015}{(H8804)} their heart{H3820} to hate{H8130}{(H8800)} his people{H5971}, to deal subtilly{H5230}{(H8692)} with his servants{H5650}.
He sent{H7971}{(H8804)} Moses{H4872} his servant{H5650}; and Aaron{H175} whom he had chosen{H977}{(H8804)}.
They shewed{H7760}{(H8804)} his signs{H226}{H1697} among them, and wonders{H4159} in the land{H776} of Ham{H2526}.
He sent{H7971}{(H8804)} darkness{H2822}, and made it dark{H2821}{(H8686)}; and they rebelled{H4784}{(H8804)} not against his word{H1697}.
He turned{H2015}{(H8804)} their waters{H4325} into blood{H1818}, and slew{H4191}{(H8686)} their fish{H1710}.
Their land{H776} brought forth{H8317} frogs{H6854} in abundance{H8317}{(H8804)}, in the chambers{H2315} of their kings{H4428}.
He spake{H559}{(H8804)}, and there came{H935}{(H8799)} divers sorts of flies{H6157}, and lice{H3654} in all their coasts{H1366}.
He gave{H5414}{(H8804)} them hail{H1259} for rain{H1653}, and flaming{H3852} fire{H784} in their land{H776}.
He smote{H5221}{(H8686)} their vines{H1612} also and their fig trees{H8384}; and brake{H7665}{(H8762)} the trees{H6086} of their coasts{H1366}.
He spake{H559}{(H8804)}, and the locusts{H697} came{H935}{(H8799)}, and caterpillers{H3218}, and that without number{H4557},
And did eat up{H398}{(H8799)} all the herbs{H6212} in their land{H776}, and devoured{H398}{(H8799)} the fruit{H6529} of their ground{H127}.
He smote{H5221}{(H8686)} also all the firstborn{H1060} in their land{H776}, the chief{H7225} of all their strength{H202}.
He brought them forth{H3318}{(H8686)} also with silver{H3701} and gold{H2091}: and there was not one feeble{H3782}{(H8802)} person among their tribes{H7626}.
Egypt{H4714} was glad{H8055}{(H8804)} when they departed{H3318}{(H8800)}: for the fear{H6343} of them fell{H5307}{(H8804)} upon them.
He spread{H6566}{(H8804)} a cloud{H6051} for a covering{H4539}; and fire{H784} to give light{H215}{(H8687)} in the night{H3915}.
The people asked{H7592}{(H8804)}, and he brought{H935}{(H8686)} quails{H7958}, and satisfied{H7646}{(H8686)} them with the bread{H3899} of heaven{H8064}.
He opened{H6605}{(H8804)} the rock{H6697}, and the waters{H4325} gushed out{H2100}{(H8799)}; they ran{H1980}{(H8804)} in the dry places{H6723} like a river{H5104}.
For he remembered{H2142}{(H8804)} his holy{H6944} promise{H1697}, and Abraham{H85} his servant{H5650}.
And he brought forth{H3318}{(H8686)} his people{H5971} with joy{H8342}, and his chosen{H972} with gladness{H7440}:
And gave{H5414}{(H8799)} them the lands{H776} of the heathen{H1471}: and they inherited{H3423}{(H8799)} the labour{H5999} of the people{H3816};
That they might observe{H8104}{(H8799)} his statutes{H2706}, and keep{H5341}{(H8799)} his laws{H8451}. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}.
